00012 #ifndef _FM_VECTOR2_H_
00013 #define _FM_VECTOR2_H_
00014 
00021 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FMVector2
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     union
00025     {
00026         float u;    
00027         float x;    
00028     };
00029     union
00030     {
00031         float v;    
00032         float y;    
00033     };
00034 
00035 public:
00039     #ifndef _DEBUG
00040     FMVector2() {}
00041     #else
00042     FMVector2() { u = 123456789.0f; v = 123456789.0f; }
00043     #endif 
00044 
00051     FMVector2(float _u, float _v) { u = _u; v = _v; }
00052 
00058     inline operator float*() { return &u; }
00059 
00069     inline FMVector2& operator +=(const FMVector2& a) { u += a.u; v += a.v; return *this; }
00070 
00080     inline FMVector2& operator *=(float a) { u *= a; v *= a; return *this; }
00081     
00092     inline FMVector2& operator =(const float* f) { u = *f; v = *(f + 1); return *this; }
00093 
00094 public:
00095     static const FMVector2 Zero;
00096     static const FMVector2 Origin;
00097 };
00098 
00106 inline FMVector2 operator + (const FMVector2& a, const FMVector2& b) { return FMVector2(a.u + b.u, a.v + b.v); }
00107 
00115 inline FMVector2 operator -(const FMVector2& a, const FMVector2& b) { return FMVector2(a.u - b.u, a.v - b.v); }
00116 
00124 inline float operator *(const FMVector2& a, const FMVector2& b) { return a.u * b.u + a.v * b.v; }
00125 
00133 inline FMVector2 operator *(const FMVector2& a, float b) { return FMVector2(a.u * b, a.v * b); }
00134 
00140 inline FMVector2 operator *(float a, const FMVector2& b) { return FMVector2(a * b.u, a * b.v); }
00141 
00147 inline FMVector2 operator /(const FMVector2& a, float b) { return FMVector2(a.x / b, a.y / b); }
00148 
00154 inline bool IsEquivalent(const FMVector2& a, const FMVector2& b) { return IsEquivalent(a.x, b.x) && IsEquivalent(a.y, b.y); }
00155 
00157 typedef fm::vector<FMVector2> FMVector2List;
00158 
00159 #endif // _FM_VECTOR2_H_
